caption.p: Phylogenetic analysis of SARS-CoV-2 AP66 and SARS-CoV-2 GZ69 isolates. Maximum likelihood tree of 3,173 sequences of SARS-CoV-2 sampled worldwide. The two strains evaluated in this study were marked with the colored circles. On the right side, zooms of the clades containing the two Italian SARS-CoV-2 isolates are shown
